content.rendered:
Effective Date: 12th March 2025
Last Updated: 12th March 2025

Welcome to Mission Control! These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your use of our website, services, and any related content provided by Mission Control (“Company,” “we,” “us,” or “our”). By accessing or using our website https://missioncontrol.uk.com (“Website”) and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

1. Services
Mission Control provides web development, design, consulting, and related digital services (“Services”). By engaging with our Services, you agree to provide accurate information and comply with applicable laws.

2. Eligibility
By using our Services, you represent that you meet the requirements stated below:

  • REQUIREMENT #1
  • REQUIREMENT #2
  • REQUIREMENT #3
  • REQUIREMENT #4

3. Client Responsibilities

  • You agree to provide necessary access, content, and feedback in a timely manner.
  • You warrant that you own or have rights to all materials provided to us.
  • You acknowledge that delays in providing required materials may impact timelines.

4. Payments & Refunds

  • Payments must be made according to the agreed-upon terms outlined in the project contract or invoice.
  • Deposits may be required before work commences.
  • Refunds are subject to the terms agreed upon in the service contract. Once work has commenced, refunds may be limited or unavailable.

5. Intellectual Property

  • All original work created by Mission Control remains our intellectual property until full payment is received.
  • Once payment is complete, ownership of deliverables is transferred to the client, except for any third-party assets.
  • We may display completed work in our portfolio unless agreed otherwise.

6. Third-Party Tools & Services
We may use third-party tools, plugins, or services to complete projects. We are not responsible for issues arising from these third-party resources.

7. Limitation of Liability
To the fullest extent permitted by law, Mission Control is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages related to the use of our Services.

8. Termination
We reserve the right to refuse or terminate Services at our discretion. Clients may also terminate Services, subject to the terms of the agreed contract.

9. Privacy Policy
Your use of our Services is also governed by our Privacy Policy, available at [Insert Privacy Policy Link].

10. Changes to These Terms
We may update these Terms from time to time. Continued use of our Services after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.

11. Contact Information
For questions about these Terms, contact us at:

Mission Control
Email: hello@missioncontrol.uk.com
Website: https://missioncontrol.uk.com
